renderer.description: Render parameterized text. Obtain the style and styleClass attributees from this component. If either are present, render a "span" element. Output the styleClass attribute (if present) as the value of the class attribute. Output the style attribute as the value of the style attribute. Accrue a list of the values of all child UIParameter components of this component. If there are one or more accumulated parameter values, convert the list of parameter values to an Object array, call MessageFormat.format(), passing the value of this component as the first argument, and the array of parameter values as the second argument, and render the result. Otherwise, render the value of this component unmodified.
